Object Shape: Boomerang, Circle, Oval, Sphere, Teardrop, Triangle
divs: sighting detailsi saw more than one but, they seemed to be the same object and in the same areas. except one that is black and shaped like a large teardrop. the white objects seem to be either, triangular\ v shaped or pure bright solid, white circles or ovals above my house . i see them as i am uploading my photos to iphoto on my mac computer. the sky has been very blue and clear. no planes were visible when i took pictures with my nikon digital camera and no sound at all. i live in the country and surrounded by grape vineyards and have open sky. i mostly see objects at night. i was quite surprised when i had captured objects during the daytime. one white object i caught on camera looks irregular in shape. i never seen anything like it. i know what i caught is not anything like a plane. today is october 3, 2013. i added photos on mufon. thank you.

Summary: White solid triangular/boomerang shape as I took pictures above my house.
